# Morningstar ByAllAccounts

**Company:** Morningstar, Inc. (ByAllAccounts Division)  
**Website:** https://www.morningstar.com/business/products/byallaccounts  
**Category:** Financial Data Aggregation / Account Aggregation  
**Status:** SaaS Verification Complete

---

## Overview

ByAllAccounts is a financial data and account aggregation platform that exclusively serves the wealth management ecosystem. Part of Morningstar Wealth, it provides holistic data collection and management through a single connection to over 1,200 custodial data sources and 6,000+ advisory firms.

**Key Features:**
- Financial account aggregation from held-away accounts
- Custodial book of business data access
- Portfolio analytics and reporting
- Multi-advisor affiliation model support
- Compliance and trade monitoring
- Financial planning data integration
